channel.title: Need help making safe zones
channel.description:
Hello moparscape forum members, i require some assistances for my server. Apparently, i need to get safe zone codes because there are certain parts of my server that should [b]NOT[/b] be a dangerous area.
All i ask is if i can give you the coords for my wanted safe area and you give me the codes with the coords to make the safe area.
Here are the cords Top right: X2309 Y9801 Top left: X2314 Y9801 Bottom right: X2309 Y9798 Bottom left: X2314 Y9798
And for my last one Top right: X3241 Y9358 Top left: X3255 Y9358 Bottom right: X3243 Y9354 Bottom left: X3253 Y9354
Thanks! Also, can you tell me where to insert the codes as if it was a tutorial because i'm kind of newby at coding. Thanks again![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 20, 2008, 05:22:53 pm[/size][hr]Bump. please help :(

item.title: Need help making safe zones
item.dc:creator: @i_am_teh_pr0 i_am_teh_pr0
